title: Phase I Study Of SU011248 In Combination With Oxaliplatin, Leucovorin, And 5-Fluorouracil In Patients With Advanced Solid Malignancies

operands.value: Advanced solid tumor malignancy (during expansion at the maximum tolerated dose, entry will be limited to patients with adenocarcinoma of the colon or rectum)
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Prior treatment with more than 6 cycles of traditional alkylating agent-based chemotherapy regimens
Prior treatment with more than 2 cycles of carboplatin-based chemotherapy regimens
For colorectal cancer patients in the expanded cohorts, prior treatment with more than 2 systemic chemotherapy regimens in the metastatic setting

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Advanced solid tumor malignancy (during expansion at the maximum tolerated dose, entry will be limited to patients with adenocarcinoma of the colon or rectum)'), Symbol('Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) 0 or 1'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Not(Or(Symbol('For colorectal cancer patients in the expanded cohorts, prior treatment with more than 2 systemic chemotherapy regimens in the metastatic setting'), Symbol('Prior treatment with more than 2 cycles of carboplatin-based chemotherapy regimens'), Symbol('Prior treatment with more than 6 cycles of traditional alkylating agent-based chemotherapy regimens'))))
